overview:
Mike Periu is a bilingual executive with experience in personal finance, entrepreneurship and small business management.

He is the founder of EcoFin Media, LLC, a leading provider of financial literacy content for television, radio, print and online distribution.

He is the financial expert on Univisionâ€™s award-winning morning show Despierta America and has been interviewed over 300 times in national and international media, including CNN en espaÃ±ol and several appearances on Al Punto with Jorge Ramos.

Mike is also a business leader in the Hispanic community using his extensive experience to inspire and motivate aspiring entrepreneurs. He s the founder and a director of the New Business Institute which provides training and professional services to entrepreneurs and small business owners.

Mike authors the fast-growing multimedia Spanish-language financial blog DINEROyCREDITO.com and he writes a nationally syndicated Spanish-language financial advice column of the same name.

Prior to his work in personal finance and entrepreneurship, Mike co-founded Proximo International, LLC, Trans 24/7 and Posip, Inc.

Mike has degrees in Finance and International Business from Georgetown University.
